author: prestonvanloon
content:
I would like to set the goerli github repo to a public archive. Does anyone have any final updates or objections? https://github.com/eth-clients/goerli

We see a few random / spam issues opened from time to time. Goerli is sunset completely and should be made a public archive. If no objections, I will change the repo to public archive on Monday, 2024-06-03.
